channel.title: #~rscb~#, new server #~24/7~#
channel.description:
Hey guys,
The beta went well, i took a few suggestions and added them, I'm still open to suggestions in game and ive decided to realise the game now and see how things go for playing/pking/skilling and such.
Before anyone asks, I will never add dragon or rune items into shop i feel it spoils the thrill of pking and the economy and it just sucks tbh.
the exp rate it higher than the actual exp im working on having it im open to suggestions on exp rate so feel free to give me your opinions on what you think work atm ive placed it to around 50x but will be dropped in the next few hours.
[img]http://img266.imageshack.us/img266/194/blackdragoni.jpg[/img]
Black dragon located at lava maze, drops dragon, rune and runes.
[img]http://img243.imageshack.us/img243/332/slime.jpg[/img]
This is slime, i did not want to stick to all the usual npcs that people use hes located near baby red and red dragons, he drops from rune to dragon also.
[img]http://img171.imageshack.us/img171/77/clientg.jpg[/img]
This is front page for client there no need to register your username on forums at the moment i will change if people feel it would be better but at a later date.
Theres also KBD and ROA spread around that drop dragon, rune, cash ect.
Hope you enjoy the server and please any suggestions that you would like added go to forums and put in suggestions, hope you like the server thank you for looking :)
More To Come :) .
LATEST UPDATES:
:Custome Item's ! :Fixed Most Bugs Non Yet Reported :Under Construction of making big client :New Forum's Not Up still at the same website
[img]http://img230.imageshack.us/img230/9609/agen.jpg[/img]
You can get the Drops of our little npc names ~Slime~ :D
The Server is currently Had A lot of People Playing At differnt Times Of The Day
Many More Updates to come !
[img]http://img101.imageshack.us/img101/4224/onlinewithing2days.jpg[/img]

@dublon wrote:

Hey guys,

The beta went well, i took a few suggestions and added them, I’m still open to suggestions in game and ive decided to realise the game now and see how things go for playing/pking/skilling and such.

Before anyone asks, I will never add dragon or rune items into shop i feel it spoils the thrill of pking and the economy and it just sucks tbh.

the exp rate it higher than the actual exp im working on having it im open to suggestions on exp rate so feel free to give me your opinions on what you think work atm ive placed it to around 50x but will be dropped in the next few hours.

Black dragon located at lava maze, drops dragon, rune and runes.

This is slime, i did not want to stick to all the usual npcs that people use hes located near baby red and red dragons, he drops from rune to dragon also.

This is front page for client there no need to register your username on forums at the moment i will change if people feel it would be better but at a later date.

Theres also KBD and ROA spread around that drop dragon, rune, cash ect.

Hope you enjoy the server and please any suggestions that you would like added go to forums and put in suggestions, hope you like the server thank you for looking
